pr_title: Preserve hip and shoulder damage on a refit

timeline.message: preserve hip and shoulder damage on a refit

timeline.bodyText: What if we actually replaced the location? e.g. changed structure type from endo-steel to standard or vice versa.
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText: Good catch - I'll add a check for that. I'll probably also need to ensure the old location with the broken joint doesn't get stored in the warehouse.
replies.author: RexPearce

timeline.message: don't preserve joint damage when refit replaces a location (i.e. endo <-> std)
don't add locations with joint damage to warehouse
